title: ProtectedChat
description: Enriched with Responsiveness, Title Prediction, Streaming Responses, History, Advanced Authentications, Temporary Chat and more.
techStack: Built with Next.js, Redux, PostgreSQL, Tailwind, Redis, JWT, GitHub Actions (CI/CD), and Docker.

title: MediChoice AI
description: AI-powered clinic management app with doctor suggestions, appointment booking, and advanced search.
techStack: Built with Next.js, NestJS, PostgreSQL, Tailwind, Prisma, and Gemini API.

title: CollabTask
description: Created a project management platform enabling task assignment, file submissions, and audit tracking. Implemented role-based permissions for admins and collaborators.
techStack: Built with React (Vite), Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, SCSS, and Passport.js.
